tool_description: Manages communication and coordination with wedding vendors, tracking schedules, contact information, and collaboration requirements for photography integration.

vendor_types.description: Types of vendors (caterer, florist, videographer, dj, planner, decorator)

communication_method.description: Preferred communication method (email, phone, text, app)

lead_time_days.description: Days before event to initiate coordination

shared_timeline_access.description: Whether vendors need shared timeline access

coordination_meeting_needed.description: Whether a coordination meeting is needed

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: vendor_names, vendor_types, and vendor_contacts arrays must have the same length
Invalid vendor type: Use one of [caterer, florist, videographer, dj, planner, decorator, venue, transport, officiant]
Invalid communication method: Use one of [email, phone, text, app]
Invalid lead time: Lead time must be between 1 and 90 days
Invalid follow-up frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, bi_weekly]
Empty required fields: Provide at least one vendor with name, type, and contact
usage: Provide event_id and matching arrays of vendor_names, vendor_types, and vendor_contacts. Configure communication preferences and coordination requirements through optional parameters.

coordination_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the coordination plan

vendor_contact_summary.description: Summary of vendor contacts and their roles

coordination_checklist.description: Checklist of coordination tasks to complete
